name: Seven Seas (Matt)
description:
Alien pirates are sailing around the alien Caribbean. Lead a pirate band in a deck-building, bomb-throwing adventure!

Add cards to your deck after each fight, then use them in the turn-based combat.

Partial gamepad support.

Controls:

  • WASD to pan view
  • Left-click to select cards and units
  • Right-click to cancel aiming/selecting

A game by Matthew and Campbell Suter
